definitions.text: a concluding summary (as in presenting a case before a law court)
(physiology) the process whereby multiple stimuli can produce a response (in a muscle or nerve or other part) that one stimulus alone does not produce

examples: the sum of all our troubles did not equal the misery they suffered

definitions.text: the arithmetic operation of summing; calculating the sum of two or more numbers
examples: the summation of four and three gives seven
